name: AMERICAN MEDICAL ASSOCIATION
sampleDescriptions: S.8092, Opioid Addiction Prevention Act and other legislation dealing with the opioid crisis; healthcare policy issues in H.R. 1892, the Bipartisan Budget Act of 2018.
Legislation dealing with the opioid abuse crisis, including S. 2456 "The CARA 2.0 Act of 2018: H.R. 6 SUPPORT for Patients and Communities Act, and S. 3120.
H.R. 6, the SUPPORT for Patients and Communities Act, and S. 3120.
Discussions regarding possible legislative action related to 42 CFR Part 2 regulations (privacy of part 2 substance abuse medical records).
Legislation dealing with reform of the American health care system and practices, including S. 1895, "The Lower Health Care Costs Act."
